Ge can involve the exchange of genes between vastly different species , e.g. putting scorpion toxin genes into maize or fish antifreeze genes into tomatoes .它可在有巨大差异的物种之间进行基因交换。比如，将蝎子毒素基因注入玉米，或者将鱼防冻基因注入西红柿。

entry.def: Vastly means to an extremely great degree or extent.

example.ex: The jury has heard two vastly different accounts of what happened.
example.tran: 陪审团听到了对所发生事件的两种截然不同的陈述。

means.word_mean: 1. to an exceedingly great extent or degree;
